item.title: CVE-2022-32171|2024-09-17T01:41:50.446Z -- zinc -- zinc
item.description: In Zinc, versions v0.1.9 through v0.3.1 are vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting when using the delete user functionality. When an authenticated user deletes a user having a XSS payload in the user id field, the javascript payload will be executed and allow an attacker to access the userâ€™s credentials.
